title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API, supporting Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and 30+ quantized models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: sync/async clients, streaming, chat & embed endpoints, fully typed.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain partner package adding Ollama LLM, chat and embeddings components with one-line swap.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama: folders, shareable chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming, and Kotlin coroutines.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: Ollama-GUI-Electron
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI built with Electron and React, wrapping local Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Next.js chat app using the Ollama JS SDK, deployable to Vercel in one click.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo showing how to expose Python functions as tools to Ollama models via JSON schema.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that proxies user messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies into threads.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-Augmented Generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with readline, syntax highlighting, chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that replaces GitHub Copilot with a local Ollama model for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Official documentation and helper scripts for running Ollama with NVIDIA GPUs on Docker and native Linux.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc., maintained by the Ollama team.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for building LLM pipelines.
